name: sunday
content:

A1 the day of the week after Saturday and before Monday, when most people in Western countries do not go to work: We're going to visit my aunt and uncle on Sunday. They go to church on Sundays. The choir is giving a concert next Sunday. I haven't done any exercise since last Sunday. New Year's Day this year is a Sunday. Sunday morning/afternoon/evening/night a traditional British Sunday lunch of roast beef and vegetables
